results.name: Number of iterations of x -> gcd(usigma(x),x) needed to reach a fixed point, where usigma is the sum of unitary divisors of n (A034448).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
Antti Karttunen, Data supplement: n, a(n) computed for n = 1..100000
program: A034448(n) = { my(f=factorint(n)); prod(k=1, #f~, 1+(f[k, 1]^f[k, 2])); }; \\ After code in A034448
xref: Cf. A034448, A323166, A327158 (positions of zeros).
